title: Has anyone tried the Superior Singing Method? - Quora

response.answer_text: This man and his business are very shady and will extort you if you let him. I unfortunately fell prey to his scam. At least I learned a lesson. Somewhere during the purchasing of his product, he sneaks in a monthly recurring fee. I do not remember ever agreeing to a monthly recurring fee, which means he hides this in small print. This is not right. I emailed regarding the situation since he had taken out nearly $300 dollars of a service I did not knowingly agree to pay for. The lack of understanding or compassion that I received made it clear that he does this constantly. I have also seen others complain about the same thing on another review website. He hopes that you do not see the monthly charge, and he will not refund you when you have realized the mistake. This is not an honest way to do business. It’s technically “legal” I suppose but it’s absolutely immoral. The best part is that when I asked what the monthly subscription offers, he realized that I didn't have an account where I could have used the services, so he made me a new account. Even with direct proof that I have never used the services, since I never willingly would have subscribed to a recurring monthly fee, even then, he would not refund the subscription charges. I never asked for a refund on the Superior Singing Method since I knowingly and gladly (though I now regret it) paid for. I just asked for a refund on a service that must have been sneakily placed in the fine print. I accidentally subscribed to recurring service once, and the company understood the situation and refunded the mistake. Aaron does not treat his customers the same way since he seems to operate with the infamous recurring subscription fee scam. It is an honest product with a dishonest and hidden stipulation. There are other vocal coaches and vocal training programs that are just like hm. Do not give your money to someone who bases a large portion of his profits on unassuming people. It is not honest. In a world that is full of scammers and liars, give your money to people who mean well.

I finished the Superior Singing Method course three years ago, in early 2015, and it was really the kickstart to my singing. It did not only promise, but also delivered a tremendous improvement in my singing and made me confident, for the first time in my life, to sing in front of other people when I play music. Here's what I liked about the course: + I felt constant improvement starting from around week 2, and I just kept getting better. I am now proud to sing my favorite songs in front of people – which is something I never even dreamed about a few years ago. + It's a very high-quality course from a world-class vocal teacher with a large YouTube following. Trustworthiness you just can't get when taking lessons in the neighborhood. + It's affordable! At 99$, for the price of just two lessons with my face-to-face New Orleans vocal coach – I got 8 weeks full of daily lessons and exercises that have proven to make me improve way faster. + The structure of the course is easy to follow and will motivate you to improve and to keep going. The members area is built in a professional level as well. + You can watch the course from your tablet or mobile as well. + It's very time-efficient. You don't have to drive somewhere for a lesson. You don't have to wait for it to come in the mail since it's accessible instantly from everywhere. The lessons are short and to the point. About 15 minutes a day and you're done – and that's really all you need in order to see massive improvement as long as you're consistent. (of course that if after the warm ups you'll also sing a couple of songs so it will make it even more practical for you and you'll improve even faster. + The course comes with a large PDF e-book that summarizes all the points and tips from the course, something which I found helpful to refer back to even long after I finished the course. + They offer a bunch of follow up courses to take your singing even farther – I took the one called “Superior Harmony” where I improved my ability to sing along with other people, recognize different musical intervals that sound best when singing together, etc. + There's a 60-days full money back guarantee in case you don't dig it. GET YOUR FREE 5 PART SINGING COURSE - click here

I have not tried it. And the reason I did not try it is because in my first exposure to Mr. Anastasi’s promo (the one where he addresses the viewer from inside the empty Greek Theatre in Los Angeles), he tells a lie in order scare the viewer and to make his course look like the solution to their fear. The lie? That the “singing tips and tricks” videos that other vocal instructors post on YouTube will harm your voice. This is a wholesale lie. I have experience with several individuals who post instructive vocal content on YouTube and not only do these mini lessons NOT cause harm, but the instructors usually, if not always, inform the viewer how to avoid harming their voice. There is also another point that bothers me: There is only one video online of Anastasi singing—it’s from 2007 and it’s okay but his vocal performance—not dynamic, kinda lifeless—would never lead me to think “Hey, I should take lessons from this guy.” On the other hand, the instructors who I follow online (Mark Baxter and Ken Tamplin mostly) can really sing and there’s plenty of video evidence. Aaron Anastasi might be a good singer but he’s a Superior Marketer. Many marketers tell casual lies. The best ones don’t.

Let me just highlight that the Superior Singing Method created by Aaron Anastasi is a breakthrough method which will help skyrocket your singing ability and improve your singing voice, complete octave in your vocal range. So this is an opportunity to finally learn to sing. This will definitely help you but still, the results may differ from one person to another. The Superior Singing Method system gives you over 31 dynamic vocal training exercises and techniques, divided into 8 following modules: Module 1: Unique Vocal Warm Up Exercises Module 2: Breath Management and Diaphragm Breathing Module 3: Mastering Vocal Tone Module 4: Improving Pitch Module 5: Resonance and Singing With Power Module 6: The Mix Voice and Singing Higher Notes Module 7: Improving Vocal Agility Module 8: Advanced Strengthening and Vocal Techniques Each module comes with Video Lessons and Vocal Exercise Track. Watch each step-by-step training video at your own pace so you learn how to sing, how to do each exercise, and what to do in order to improve your singing ability. Then, simply listen and sing along with your vocal exercise tracks while you are in your car, at home, in the shower, or in the studio. Pop the tracks onto your iPod or CD player and take them wherever you go. By watching the videos prior to listening to the exercise tracks you will know exactly how to do each exercise. And with the daily routines, every day will be different so that you develop your entire voice and vocal range. Here's Exactly What You Get Inside… - 8 modules packed with cutting-edge vocal training content. - Over 50 step-by-step videos guiding you every step of the way. - 31 dynamic vocal exercise audios. - An unconditional 60-day money back guarantee. Plus, Claim These Exclusive Bonuses if You Order Today! - Guide To Performing (Value: $47) - Guide To Music Marketing (Value: $47) - “Developing Your Head Voice” mini-course (value $47) - “Vocal Agility” mini-course (value $47) Superior Singing Method does not provide you with a singing magical mantra and it does not turn you into an instant diva, but it teaches you a proven and effective singing technique on how to sing correctly with ease. Whoever is interested to purchase this product still have to do all the work. This is not a scam, this is a real course. Superior Singing Method is not only for beginners but it is also beneficial to those who are already in the business. The Mix Voice segment is especially powerful for intermediate and advanced singers. The only precaution in this program is that you cannot skip a step. Everything needs to be done in a specified order. You cannot, for instance, jump to vocal range exercise without retraining your vocal chords or you may risk injuring your muscle. With a 60-day money back guarantee, Superior Singing Method is definitely worth a try.

For a complete review you can check: How To Sing Better- Learn To Sing With The Superior Singing Method Superior Singing Method is an online voice training program that teaches people how to improve their singing voice.Whether you are a beginner or an experienced singer, Superior Singing Method is designed to help you enhance your singing talent, or gradually make you a good singer.With the help of a professional and that of the author Aaron Anastasi, you will go through eight steps of vocal training; where each step is focused on a specific area of your vocals.The training concentrates on improving your pitch, develop a precise vocal agility that enables you to jump from one note to another, learn techniques used by advanced singers for smooth and easy singing, how to overcome tension while singing, help you strengthen your voice muscle through vocal exercises incorporated in the course, and finally make you an overall good singer.Superior Singing Method is useful to any person who has an interest in singing, whether you are a totall beginner, or an advanced singer, it will help you learn from the comfort of your home.What is inside Superior Singing Method?-Eight modules where each module is dedicated to perform a unique purpose from the other.-50 Step-By-Step Short videos to help you in the learning process.-Vocal exercise – this is a “How to Sing Harmony” video which features a special two-time Grammy award winner.-A detailed guide that gives you useful tips on how to prepare well for singing – this is a complete manual.-A guide to music marketing; where you will learn on the efficient way to market your singing skills.

Yes, I and my friend have tried it about six months ago, in my opinion, the course is worth to try. It's not the best course I ever tried (I also have an offline singing course), but overall I think it the most reliable online course for singing. You may want to read more buyer reviews here Superior Singing Method Buyer Reviews & Discount The main course consists of 8 modules with step by step video instructions and vocal exercises tracks which is it makes the course easy to follow. On these modules, you will learn vocal technique, breath management, vocal tone, pitch improvement, resonance and sing power, mix voice, vocal agility and many more. It's a really complete singing course. What I love about this course is that it's portable for vary device, I can download and save all the materials to my smartphone so I can practice the lesson anywhere and whenever I want. You can get/download all the course materials through the member area on their website.  The creator Aaron Anastasi give his customers not only a singing exercises but also give them a diet guidance, what to eat and what to avoid to make your singing level better. Based on our experience (me and my friend) I would recommend this course for anyone who wants to lift up their singing level. I and my friend feel get an improvement from time to time and able to sing better than before.  => Superior Singing Method Buyer Reviews & Discount <=

Nope, never tried it! I guess I'm an inferior singer. But I did just check out the information on their website! It's a mix of info that would be broadly considered false in the singing community, laughably oversimplified facts, and good fundamental basics of singing. Maybe 10% is in that last category. Personally I'm against these sorts of systems, and think they're usually scams, because there isn't a lot that's proven to get you good at singing for relatively little money, other than voice lessons. You'd just get more bang for your buck from a single voice lesson than from this whole course.

I do appreciate the view points of David and I feel that most of what he has said is true. However, this specific course “The Superior Singing Method” does not sound a bluff to me and the source of this course is quite credible enough for justifying it. Aaron Anastasi, the founder of this course, isn’t a self proclaimed guru or something. He has lot’s of experience in this field, has worked directly with many Gammy Award winning producers and has a lot of recognition specifically in this field. Throughout his career he has taught lessons of singing to many and people have appreciated his lessons greatly. Although I haven’t tried this course myself because I am not really into this stuff. But based on the above stated fact I am convinced that this course might be worth trying. And if you are looking for any detailed perspective then I suggest you to read this article The Superior Singing Method - Best Singing Lesson Online? - Hobbiesphere. I have personally read this one thoroughly and am willing to recommend a thorough read of it to anyone who’s interested in purchasing this course.

My kid got interested in this program and I purchased whole set of modules online. It is OK, but then, the kid didn’t continue. That purchase was a few months ago. Yesterday my credit card company sent me a notice by email that this company was trying to charge my credit card - without my authorization! I immediately tried to go to their website where I bought the program from, thinking I can find their contact number to tell them to stoping doing so, and it turned out that their website is DEAD - everywhere you clicked, it was linked to a dead web page. So I guessed this company was out of business. But I am very disappointed about their final attempt to charge my credit card for something that they are no longer offering.

It’s a scam. I tried it with limited good result, but what was particularly galling was finding continuing charges on my credit card, that is, AFTER I paid for it, they continued to charge me. It’s like, “what, you didn’t know that when you give us your credit card info, we just continue to charge you? Well, then, it sounds like YOU’ve made a bad mistake.” There are a few people who are positive, but I suspect they don’t know about the continuing charges or are paid to promote it. There is an Asian guy who is all positive, but then, what’s this, on his website he is selling the product.

Yes! I tried out Superior singing method after my dad recommended it to me. Though in bits and pieces, I have completed the whole course and practice the voice exercises from time to time as well. I have had an immensely positive experience with this course. Aaron starts from the absolute basics of breathing techniques and correct posture and gradually builds it up to advanced teachings. I have noticed quite a bit of improvement in my voice's range, agility and power. I would strongly recommend it. Good luck with your singing endeavors!

Yes, I tried..! It was just awesome! {Recommended} About year ago i bought it, and it completely changed my singing style in just 15 weeks, (Yes,I am a bit lazy :P) Now i am professional singer here in my town and an experienced member of our Band. David Leigh If you are not sure about it, so i will recommend that check out this review and Free Videos of Superior singing and make you decision! Review: The Superior Singing Method Review | Does it Really Work in 2018? Hope it will help you!

I’m currently going through the courses right now and I’ve already learned a few things I didn’t know before and it’s helped me improve a bit more already .. I like the way he teaches because not only does he teach us how to to sing better but he also give explanations behind all the exercises he has you do. :)
I did not enjoy the course and asked for my money back (guaranteed money back within 60 days of purchase). I contacted them twice to get a refund and they ignored both of my emails.

I read a review about the Superior Singing Method here and was really considering buying the course it looks really great. Was wanting to get some other people who have tried it to let me know how it is.
